definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: ruin, destruction;—´[[מ]]: abs. Je 5:26 + 10 t.;—physical destruction Ez Eze 5:16, Eze 9:6, Eze 21:36, Eze 25:15, Ex 12:13 (P), 2Ch 20:23, 2Ch 22:4; ´[[בַּעַל מ]]: Pr 18:9 = destroyer; Da 10:8 (disfigurement); ´[[הַר־מ]]: Je 51:25 (fig. of Bab. as destroyer), in 2Ki 23:13 = mt. of corruption (where bamoth were, S. end of Mt. Of Olives, poss. adapted from [[הַר־מִשְׁחָה]] so Hoffm:ZAW ii (1882), 175 Benz Kit Bur; Vulgate mons offensionis).
